text: "Link Up" is a song by Los Angeles-based duo NxWorries, released as the second single of their debut EP, Link Up & Suede. "Link Up", was broadcast on Zane Lowe's Beats 1 radio show on December 1, 2015. == Music video == On March 3, 2016, the music video for "Link Up" was released on the official Stones Throw YouTube channel. It featured guest appearances from Eric André and Earl Sweatshirt. == References == Category:2015 songs Category:Songs written by Anderson Paak
title: Link Up (song)
